titles.title: Office of Personal Savings Promotion Act of 1994
To establish the Office of Personal Savings Promotion within the Department of the Treasury.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/24/1994--Introduced. Office of Personal Savings Promotion Act of 1994 - Amends Federal monetary law to establish, in the Department of the Treasury, the Office of Personal Savings Promotion to develop policies and recommendations for administrative and legislative action to increase the rate of domestic personal savings.
